reviews.text: Like many station in the area its a basic one with 1 up and 1 down track with limited aminaties one problem is you have to pay to park but you can get on Tesco car park for free. I viited on a wey day and there was lots of flooding on the car park and other areas
Given the state of most of the rail network this station is in good condition. Everywhere is clean and tidy, however, most of the station needs a lick of paint.
Apparently, this Station won Station of the year once. I believe for it's floral garden, though a bit run-down now.

So me and the wife want to go to Manchester for the day on a weekend £10+ per person plus pay for parking, plus its only the really old pacer trains which are uncomfortable, dirty and unreliable. Getting a bus to the trainstation isn't an option so I would definately have to pay parking.

It actually works out cheaper to drive to Manchester in the comfort of a car. Given the choice why waste your money here.

If NR dropped ticket prices and if there were no car parking charges there might be more customers!
